short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Use short keywords to access all of your company's universe in a second.⚡️

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Superpower your colleague's workflows with shortcuts to your most commonly used URLs, and most common internal searches.

If you're familiar with Alfred's Web Search feature, this extension provides pretty much the same functionality within the Chrome web browser, with the added bonus of a centralized database for shortcuts, built in Airtable

See https://github.com/theoBLT/DotSearch for set-up instructions.
